cleanDesc: OEM Pierburg Throttle Body Assembly - E70 E90 Diesel
short-description: Throttle bodies control the amount of air entering the intake manifold, as well as telling your engine computer where the idle and wide open throttle positions are. The sensors on your throttle body can wear out over time. These sensors control vital engine features through the engine computer. If your vehicle is throwing a check engine light about throttle position, this may be the issue. If your vehicle is not idling properly or you feel the power at wide open throttle is not proper, replace your throttle body. Easily replaced with simple hand tools.

cleanDesc:
M50 Throttle Body to M54 E46 325 Intake Manifold - Adapter Plate
  ...
short-description: TMS SPEED World Challenge racing team incorporates the M50 throttle body to the E46 325 intake. The reasoning for this is simple. It allows us to use a mechanically operated M50 throttle body instead of the M54 drive by wire throttle body used on E46 motors. The advantage of this is that we can easily use aftermarket management systems (i.e. Motec). The plate mounts flush with 4 flat head M6 allen bolts, and 4 M6 hex head bolts directly between the intake and throttle body and is SCCA legal.

cleanDesc: Adapter Plate to Mount M50/S50B30 US Throttle Body or M52TU Dive-By-...
short-description: This adapter is designed to mount a M50/S50B30 US mechanically operated or M52TU Dive-By-Wire Throttle Body to a M54B30 Intake Manifold. There are several configurations where you could use this adapter but this was originally developed for our racecars that used stand alone ECUs (MoTeC or Bosch Motorsport).     Adapter Plate to Mount    to   It allows you to use a mechanically operated throttle body instead of the drive by wire throttle body. The advantage of this is that you can easily use aftermarket engine management systems without extra wiring and programming.     Adapter Plate to Mount    to   It allows you to use a M54B30 intake manifold with your M52TU engine, throttle body, and stock ECU. The advantage is increased air flow from the M54B30 intake manifold over the M52TU intake manifold. Note: the M52TU throttle body will need to be modified to work in the application.    In all cases, the original idle control valve was deleted and the port in the intake manifold was plugged. If your new ECU system still relies on the idle control valve this adapter may not work as intended. The plate mounts flush to the manifold with 4 flat head M6 Allen bolts (included). The throttle body mounts to the adapter with 4 M6 hex head bolts (not included, original mounting bolts can be re-used).

      ...
short-description: Achilles Motorsports' Throttle Conversion Kit was designed and manufactured to allow the removal of the OEM drive-by-wire system and replaces it with a more conventional throttle cable system. This kit is very useful when the S54 engine is installed in other BMW chassis (ie. E30, E36), or in the E46 M3 chassis when used to run with aftermarket ECU's. This kit features machined, billet aluminum components and incorporates a housing(barrel) with two side-by-side bearings and an 8mm shaft that allows for smooth, linear pedal actuation with no flex.
